data.title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory
data.meta_description: Discover everything you need to know about Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory.
data.text:
News

Splinter Cell Chaos Theory free on PC this week

If you're happy to use Ubisoft Connect.

Ishraq Subhan

News

Chaos Theory creator plays Splinter Cell's greatest ever level

In honour of Panama Papers leak.

Robert Purchese

News

Far Cry 2 and Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory director Clint Hocking returns to Ubisoft

But not to work on the next Splinter Cell.

Wesley Yin-Poole

News

Valve hires Far Cry 2, Splinter Cell VIP Clint Hocking

Maybe he'll work on Half-Life 3, speculate speculate.

Robert Purchese

News

Splinter Cell HD Trilogy release date

Tomorrow for 24 quid.

Robert Purchese

News

Splinter Cell/POP HD Collections likely

More retailer listings for HD trilogies appear.

Wesley Yin-Poole

News

Splinter Cell and POP trilogies appear

For PlayStation 3.

Wesley Yin-Poole

News

More Xbox Originals soon on Live

Chaos Theory and Metal Arms.

Robert Purchese

News

Ubisoft plans King Kong, Splinter Cell for Nintendo DS

Joining a DS line-up that consists of Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith, Bomberman DS, Rayman DS, Sprung and Asphalt Urban GT, with more titles based on internal franchises set to follow.

Tom Bramwell

News

New Chaos Theory maps out

And causing problems on X360.

Ellie Gibson

News

New plot for Splinter Cell film

Sam is now a cartoon badger.

Tom Bramwell

News

New Chaos Theory Xbox maps

Which, er, don't work?

Tom Bramwell

Review

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

Stealth via stylus - our verdict.

Ellie Gibson

News

New Chaos Theory maps soon

On Xbox and PC.

Tom Bramwell

Review

Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

Even your mum could play it. In theory.

Kristan Reed

Preview

Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

We go hands on with the latest build of Ubisoft's stealth action blockbuster.

Kristan Reed

Preview

Splinter Cell 3

Quickfire sequel reveals Sam Fisher to be a nasty piece of work... in a good way.

Kristan Reed
